snippet: It started when the Ohio Election Commission received a complaint against a mechanical engineer who, on Twitter, asked voters to stop a streetcar project. courts are ruling on hyperbole in Twitter posts.
abstract: It started when the Ohio Election Commission received a complaint against a mechanical engineer who, on Twitter, asked voters to stop a streetcar project. courts are ruling on hyperbole in Twitter posts.

headline.main: Was That Twitter Blast False, or Just Honest Hyperbole?
